about_the_game:
Can you build and fight through endless levels to bring life and color to your world?

HexeD is a fast-paced, colorful, and customizable tower defense game where you can build your towers and troops with the exact stats you want before deploying them for battle. You'll need to adapt with each level being procedurally generated, no game is ever the same.




  • Endless procedurally generated levels, no fight is the same
  • Fully customizable troops and towers, letting you define each game
  • Up to 6 Player online multiplayer, group up to survive longer
  • Level up your abilities! The more you play, the stronger you become.
  • Solo and Co-Op leaderboards to compete against your friends and the world

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux (Most distributions should work)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD A4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GT, AMD HD 6850, Intel HD 630
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux (Most distributions should work)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD A6
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
